title: Noam Chomsky | Neo-Liberal Assault on the Population - CSU - Speaker Series
description:
Watch as Noam Chomsky gives a talk prepared for Concordia Students in light of campus campaigns and initiatives, courtesy of your Concordia Student Union (CSU).

Want to be first at the next CSU speaker series talk? Like us on Facebook.

Facebook http://www.facebook.com/csu.qc.ca
Twitter https://twitter.com/csuconcordia
Instagram http://instagram.com/csumtl

-----------------------------------------------------------

About CSU
http://csu.qc.ca

The CSU represents over 30,000 undergraduate students and is run by students for students. We actively work hard to build a better Concordia and we do this by offering essential services, throwing great events and defending students rights within the university and beyond!
